Name: Dungeon
Description: You are in a small dungeon cell.

Items.Name: Pack of bubblegum
Items.Description: A pack of bubblegum. The brand name is "Hubbabubba". A classic from your childhood.

Items.Name: Rusty key
Items.Description: An old rusty key of simple design.

Name: Oak Room
Description: You are in a large circular room, in the middle of the room there is a patch of dirt, and on it stands a *Tree*.

Items.Name: Stick
Items.Description: A stick from an oak tree, it's quite straight. It's a good stick.
Items.InEnvironmentDescription: Under the tree you notice a stick that must have fallen from it.

RoomObjectOfInterest.Name: Tree
RoomObjectOfInterest.Description: A large oak tree, must be more than fifty years old.

Name: Drainage Room
Description:
You are in some sort of drainage room, the floor slopes towards the center of the room
where there is a *Drain* in the floor that collects water from the other rooms.

Items.Name: Golden key
Items.InEnvironmentDescription: When you look down the drain you see that a golden key is stuck in the sludge below.
Items.CantBeTakenDescription: Your hand is too big to be able to reach through the iron bars of the drainage hole.

RoomObjectOfInterest.Name: Drain
RoomObjectOfInterest.Description: A drainage hole that collects water from the floor.

Name: Final room
Description: You walk though a long tunnel sloping upwards, you see daylight in the distance. You are free.
